com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.wrappers
Class UserWrapper

java.lang.Object
  com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.wrappers.WrapperBase
      com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.wrappers.UserWrapper

public class UserWrapper
extends WrapperBase

Scripting class to give limited access to UBuildUser information. This is exposed as 'user' in some notification scripts.

Examples:

To get the username for the user: 

    user.getName()
To get the id of the user: 
    user.getId()
To get the real name of the user: 
    user.getActualName()
If you are using velocity scripts for Notification Templates, you don't have to use the full method name for getters: 
    user.Name
    user.Id
    user.ActualName
